response.overview: "Seeds" is a thought-provoking short film that explores the intricate themes of masculinity, Christianity, and mental health. Through a blend of poignant spoken word poetry and evocative visuals, the film delves into the protagonist's internal struggles and moments of revelation. As he navigates his spiritual path, "Seeds" highlights the universal quest for purpose and the grounding force of faith. This visually arresting and emotionally resonant film invites viewers to reflect on their own beliefs and the seeds of growth within their lives.
response.title: Seeds
